post:
Though the Valentine’s Day celebrations have been done, bodHOST is celebrating a complete Valentine month for its customers. We are already running a question and answer contest based on Valentine’s Day on our social media platforms and yes the one who answers all the questions correctly will be receiving shared hosting free for one year. Hurry! The competition ends on 29th February 2017.
